title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 17, 2020
description: British Columbians have been promised a clearer picture of the impact of the province's approach to the COVID-19 pandemic with the release of new statistical models on Friday morning.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • Provincial officials will give an update on B.C.'s COVID-19 modelling at 11 a.m. PT
  • The latest numbers are expected at around 3 p.m. PT.
  • As of Thursday afternoon, B.C. has confirmed 1,575 cases of COVID-19.
